application.doc: Retrieving all transaction logging components and their details

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving all transaction logging components and their details
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the Reverse Proxy transaction logging resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: retrieveAllLogComponentsJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: status
param.doc: The status for this component. Can be either "on" or "off".

param.name: rollover_size
param.doc: The maximum file size of the transaction logging data file for this component in bytes before it is rolled over.

param.name: file_size
param.doc: The current accumulated size of the transaction logging data file and all rollover files for this component in bytes.

param.name: max_rollover_files
param.doc: The maximum number of rollover files to be kept on disk. This parameter is optional. If not specified, all rollover files will be kept.

param.name: compress
param.doc: Whether the rollover files should be compressed or not. This parameter is optional. If not specified, the rollover files will not be compressed.
